## TransactableLiquity.withdrawHCHFFromStabilityPool() method

Withdraw HCHF from Stability Deposit.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withdrawHCHFFromStabilityPool(amount: Decimalish): Promise<StabilityDepositChangeDetails>;
```

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and [HLQT reward](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.hlqtreward.md)<!-- -->.
